about_the_game:
Dear delusion is a dark sci-fi 2D point-and-click adventure game.
Players use the method of clicking and dragging objects to spell out complete human skeletons to advance the game, searching for clues to understand the conception of world.

story
When your sister disappears, you find yourself in a spooky forest with lost armed men, notebooks with mysterious powers, and human bones all over the floor.
Can you find your sister and leave the forest?

Game Features:
■ Simple operation
Just click and drag objects to play.

■ Science fiction suspenseful plot
In order to find your own sister, you will have the opportunity to experience a fantastic forest journey and unearth the secrets in the dark.

■Screen experience that moves up and down
You can find objects in the upper screen and organize the found objects in the lower screen.

■ Full of weirdness
The forest has an unpredictable environment that makes it impossible to know what will happen in the next second.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP,Vista,Windows7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 90 MB available space

short_description: A little girl goes missing, you breaks into the forest restricted area to find her. However, as you explore deeper into the forest, the line between reality and fantasy fades away. Can the you piece together the whole picture, find the little girl and leave the forest?
